item.title: linux开发环境搭建
item.description: 1 nfs 1.1 安装 1 sudo apt-get install nfs-kernel-server 1.2 设置导出 1 /home/exports *(rw,nohide,insecure,no_subtree_check,async,no_root_squash) 1.3 开启服务 1 sudo /etc/init.d/nfs-kernel-server restart 1.4 测试 1 2 sudo mount -t nfs -o nolock,vers=3 127.0.0.1:/home/exports /mnt ls /mnt 2 samba 3 tftp 4 ftp 5 apache
